ACCEPTABLE RISK
LOS ANGELES

FORUM 1

December 1-15, 2018

Curated by Joshua Oduga and Stephanie Sherwood.

The inaugural FORUM mentorship program at the Torrance Art Museum culminated in an exhibition organized by its members in the main gallery space.
